Â¡Ya lo verÃ¡s! ğŸ‘©ğŸš€ğŸš€ Job 8:7.ğŸŒŒğŸ’« ------------------------------- The sky is not the limit!ğŸš€âœ¨ I am excited to share with all of you that I have received my Letter of Acceptance to participate in Project PoSSUM (Polar Suborbital Science in the Upper Mesosphere) of the International Institute for Astronautical Science (IIAS) in the USA, supported by flight opportunities from NASA and that begins my preparation in the space area as a future Scientist-Astronaut candidate. I thank God first, in addition to my parents who supported all my personal, academic and professional decisions. Also, thanks to Ana Pires for inspiring me, her great patience and advice all this time. I am excited to know that I will be part of this new family and will follow in the footsteps of great women like: â–ªï¸ Ana Pires â–ªï¸ Katya Echazarreta â–ªï¸ Kellie Gerardi â–ªï¸ Shawna Pandya â–ªï¸ Amanda Nguyen And many more. I hope to inspire more people, Latinos and Chileans as much as they do in me. Let's go to space!
